meanings.definition: Of or relating to a wheel or disk
meanings.sent1: The trochal design of the toy car's wheels made it move smoothly.
meanings.sent2: The trochal shape of the CD allowed it to spin in the player.
meanings.sent3: The trochal pattern on the rug looked like tiny wheels rolling around.
meanings.sent4: Her trochal earrings spun gracefully as she danced.
meanings.sent5: The trochal mechanism of the clock ticked with precision.

meanings.sent1: The ferris wheel's trochal was brightly colored and eye-catching.
meanings.sent2: The trochal on the bike's pedal helped it move forward smoothly.
meanings.sent3: The trochal of the spinning top made it twirl around in circles.
meanings.sent4: The trochal of the windmill turned with the breeze, generating power.
meanings.sent5: The trochal of the cart creaked as it rolled along the path.
